name: Abstract games, abstraction and architecture in Super Breakout and This War of Mine
name_original: Abstract games, abstraction and architecture in Super Breakout and This War of Mine
description:
Abstract games, abstraction and architecture in Super Breakout and This War of Mine is a game developed by Zita Szarvasi. It came out on 10-12-2019.
Abstract games, abstraction and architecture in Super Breakout and This War of Mine is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
